elements.title: United Airlines Flight 175 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that after being hijacked, United Airlines Flight 175 almost had two mid-air collisions with other aircraft before crashing into the South Tower of the World Trade Center (pictured)?

elements.title: Joe Hill (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Joe Hill, the last opera by Alan Bush, contains four songs by the real Joe Hill?

elements.title: Michele Anne Harris disappeared 20 years ago today (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that after Michele Anne Harris disappeared 20 years ago today, her husband was tried four times for her murder before being acquitted?

elements.title: Plevna (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Plevna in Tampere, Finland, was the first building in the Nordic countries and the Russian Empire (of which Finland was part at the time) to be lit by electric lights?

elements.title: Clara Leiser (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that American journalist and activist Clara Leiser traveled to Nazi Germany frequently, and documented the plight of families of political prisoners?

elements.title: tarahinau (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the New Zealand tree tarahinau has evolved to develop thinner leaves as it matures, probably as a result of the high winds of the Chatham Islands?

elements.title: Joe Murphy (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Joe Murphy's civil-engineering firm was known colloquially as "Grey Murphy" to distinguish it from that of his brother, which was known as "Green Murphy"?

elements.title: 2019 Q School (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Fraser Patrick likened playing in the 2019 Q School to being in a boxing match with Anthony Joshua?
